entry.title: F2Pool has enabled full replace-by-fee
entry.summary: In an email conversation on June 20, 2015, Eric Lombrozo expressed the need for applying pressure on merchant-end to upgrade their systems and become more resilient. Jeff Garzik, a Bitcoin core developer and open source evangelist at BitPay, asked for specific technical steps that should be taken by BitPay and Coinbase. However, no further information was provided regarding the specific upgrades needed by the companies.
